data.title: 'Curtain Call 2' Tracklist: All the Songs on Eminem's Greatest Hits Album
data.meta_description: Eminem's second greatest hits album brings together his biggest hits from 2009 to 2022, and features collabs with Rihanna, Beyoncé and Snoop Dogg.
data.text:
Curtain Call 2 is Eminem's second greatest hits collection, bringing together his biggest tracks from the last decade-plus.

The new Eminem compilation has a tracklist that takes us from his 2009 number one single "Crack a Bottle" through to his latest single "From the D 2 the LBC," which sees the rapper teaming up with Snoop Dogg.

The sequel to 2005's Curtain Call also features Eminem's duets with some of music's biggest names, including Rihanna, Beyoncé and Pink.

The 34 tracks include major hit singles, such as "Not Afraid," "Love The Way You Lie," "The Monster," and "Godzilla." However, some other hits from the last decade are missing, like number nine hit "We Made You" and number three single "Killshot."

The 34 tracks features songs from each of his six most recent albums (Relapse, Recovery, The Marshall Mathers LP 2, Revival, Kamikaze and Music to Be Murdered By) as well as tracks from his Bad Meet Evil project and pieces that originally appeared on the soundtracks for the movies Venom, Southpaw and Elvis.

Here's which Eminem songs made it onto Curtain Call 2.

Eminem's Curtain Call 2 Full Tracklist

Disc 1

1. "Godzilla" (feat. Juice Wrld) (from Music to Be Murdered By)

2. "Lucky You" (feat. Joyner Lucas) (from Kamikaze)

3. "Lighters" (Bad Meets Evil feat. Bruno Mars) (from Bad Meets Evil's album Hell: The Sequel)

4. "Gnat" (from Music to Be Murdered By)

5. "Cinderella Man" (from Recovery)

6. "Walk on Water" (feat. Beyoncé) (from Revival)

7. "Rap God" (from The Marshall Mathers LP 2)

8. "Love the Way You Lie" (feat. Rihanna) (from Recovery)

9. "Won't Back Down" (feat. Pink) (from Recovery)

10. "Higher" (from Music to Be Murdered By)

11. "Berzerk" (from The Marshall Mathers LP 2)

12. "Not Afraid" (from Recovery)

13. "From the D 2 the LBC" (feat. Snoop Dogg)

14. "Nowhere Fast" (feat. Kehlani) (from Revival)

15. "Fall" (from Kamikaze)

16. "Phenomenal" (from Southpaw soundtrack)

17. "Fast Lane" (from Hell: The Sequel)

18. "You're Never Over" (from Recovery)

Disc 2
